table.name: ca_boundaries_bgc_tbl
table.description: Geospatial boundaries for the Combined Authority (CA), generalised and clipped (BGC) to the coastline.

column.name: FID
column.description: Feature ID; unique identifier for the boundary feature.

column.name: CAUTH25CD
column.description: Combined Authority (CA) GSS code (2025 standard).

column.name: CAUTH25NM
column.description: Combined Authority name.

column.name: BNG_E
column.description: British National Grid Easting coordinate.

column.name: BNG_N
column.description: British National Grid Northing coordinate.

column.name: Shape__Area
column.description: Area of the geometry in square meters.

column.name: Shape__Length
column.description: Length of the geometry perimeter.

column.name: GlobalID
column.description: Global Unique Identifier for the feature.

column.name: geom
column.description: Spatial geometry object (polygon) defining the boundary.

table.name: ca_emissions_evidence_long_tbl
table.description: Long-format dataset of historical CO2 emissions evidence for the Combined Authority, broken down by sector.

column.name: local_authority
column.description: Name of the Local Authority.

column.name: local_authority_code
column.description: GSS code for the Local Authority.

column.name: calendar_year
column.description: Year the emissions data refers to.

column.name: population_000s_mid_year_estimate
column.description: Mid-year population estimate in thousands.

column.name: per_capita_emissions_t_co2e
column.description: Per capita emissions in tonnes of CO2 equivalent.

column.name: area_km2
column.description: Area of the authority in square kilometers.

column.name: emissions_per_km2_kt_co2e
column.description: Emissions density (kilotonnes CO2e per km2).

column.name: sector
column.description: Economic sector responsible for emissions (e.g., Transport, Industry).

column.name: total_bool
column.description: Boolean flag indicating if this row represents a grand total.

column.name: grand_total
column.description: Total emissions for the row context.

column.name: emissions_kt_co2e
column.description: Emissions in kilotonnes of CO2 equivalent.

column.name: cauthcd
column.description: Combined Authority code.

column.name: cauthnm
column.description: Combined Authority name.

table.name: ca_la_dft_lookup_tbl
table.description: Lookup table linking Local Authority codes to Department for Transport (DFT) identifiers.

column.name: dft_la_id
column.description: Department for Transport Local Authority ID.

column.name: ladcd
column.description: Local Authority District code (GSS).

column.name: year
column.description: Reference year for the lookup.

table.name: ca_la_tbl
table.description: Reference table defining Local Authorities (LA) within the Combined Authority (CA).

column.name: ladcd
column.description: Local Authority District code.

column.name: ladnm
column.description: Local Authority District name.

column.name: cauthcd
column.description: Combined Authority code.

column.name: cauthnm
column.description: Combined Authority name.

table.name: emissions_tbl
table.description: Comprehensive Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions data by local authority and sector (Industry, Commercial, Public, Domestic, Transport, LULUCF, Agriculture, Waste).

column.name: second_tier_authority
column.description: Upper tier authority (e.g., County Council) if applicable.

column.name: industry_total
column.description: Total emissions from the industrial sector.

column.name: commercial_total
column.description: Total emissions from the commercial sector.

column.name: public_sector_total
column.description: Total emissions from the public sector.

column.name: domestic_total
column.description: Total emissions from domestic (residential) sources.

column.name: transport_total
column.description: Total emissions from transport sources.

column.name: lulucf_net_emissions
column.description: Net emissions from Land Use, Land-Use Change, and Forestry.

column.name: agriculture_total
column.description: Total emissions from agriculture.

column.name: waste_total
column.description: Total emissions from waste management.

column.name: grand_total
column.description: Grand total of emissions across all sectors.

column.name: per_capita_emissions_t_co2e
column.description: Emissions per person in tonnes of CO2e.

table.name: epc_domestic_tbl
table.description: Energy Performance Certificate (EPC) data for domestic (residential) properties.

column.name: LMK_KEY
column.description: Lodgement Key; unique identifier for the EPC certificate.

column.name: BUILDING_REFERENCE_NUMBER
column.description: Unique reference number for the building.

column.name: CURRENT_ENERGY_RATING
column.description: Current Energy Efficiency Rating (A-G band).

column.name: POTENTIAL_ENERGY_RATING
column.description: Potential Energy Efficiency Rating (A-G band) if improvements are made.

column.name: CURRENT_ENERGY_EFFICIENCY
column.description: SAP rating (1-100) of the property's current energy efficiency.

column.name: POTENTIAL_ENERGY_EFFICIENCY
column.description: Potential SAP rating (1-100) if improvements are made.

column.name: PROPERTY_TYPE
column.description: Type of property (e.g., House, Flat, Bungalow).

column.name: BUILT_FORM
column.description: Structural form (e.g., Detached, Semi-Detached, Mid-Terrace).

column.name: INSPECTION_DATE
column.description: Date the energy inspection was carried out.

column.name: LODGEMENT_DATE
column.description: Date the certificate was lodged on the register.

column.name: TRANSACTION_TYPE
column.description: Reason for the EPC (e.g., marketed sale, rental, new dwelling).

column.name: ENVIRONMENT_IMPACT_CURRENT
column.description: Current Environmental Impact Rating (1-100), based on CO2 emissions.

column.name: ENVIRONMENT_IMPACT_POTENTIAL
column.description: Potential Environmental Impact Rating (1-100).

column.name: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_CURRENT
column.description: Current energy consumption (kWh/m2 per year).

column.name: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_POTENTIAL
column.description: Potential energy consumption (kWh/m2 per year).

column.name: CO2_EMISSIONS_CURRENT
column.description: Current estimated CO2 emissions (tonnes per year).

column.name: CO2_EMISS_CURR_PER_FLOOR_AREA
column.description: Current CO2 emissions per unit of floor area (kg/m2 per year).

column.name: CO2_EMISSIONS_POTENTIAL
column.description: Potential CO2 emissions (tonnes per year).

column.name: TOTAL_FLOOR_AREA
column.description: Total useful floor area (m2).

column.name: MAINS_GAS_FLAG
column.description: Indicator if the property is connected to mains gas (Y/N).

column.name: MAIN_HEATING_CONTROLS
column.description: Description of heating controls (e.g., programmer, room thermostat).

column.name: MULTI_GLAZE_PROPORTION
column.description: Percentage of windows that are multiple glazed.

column.name: GLAZED_TYPE
column.description: Type of glazing (e.g., double glazing, triple glazing).

column.name: EXTENSION_COUNT
column.description: Number of extensions to the property.

column.name: NUMBER_HABITABLE_ROOMS
column.description: Count of habitable rooms.

column.name: NUMBER_HEATED_ROOMS
column.description: Count of heated rooms.

column.name: LOW_ENERGY_LIGHTING
column.description: Percentage of fixed lighting outlets that are low energy.

column.name: NUMBER_OPEN_FIREPLACES
column.description: Number of open fireplaces.

column.name: HOTWATER_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Description of the hot water system.

column.name: WALLS_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Description of wall construction (e.g., Cavity wall).

column.name: ROOF_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Description of roof construction.

column.name: MAINHEAT_DESCRIPTION
column.description: Description of the main heating system.

column.name: MAIN_FUEL
column.description: Main fuel type used for heating (e.g., mains gas, electricity).

column.name: PHOTO_SUPPLY
column.description: Percentage of photovoltaic (solar) power supply.

column.name: SOLAR_WATER_HEATING_FLAG
column.description: Indicator if solar water heating is present (Y/N).

column.name: MECHANICAL_VENTILATION
column.description: Type of mechanical ventilation system, if any.

column.name: CONSTRUCTION_AGE_BAND
column.description: Approximate period when the property was built (e.g., 1930-1949).

column.name: TENURE
column.description: Housing tenure type (e.g., Owner-occupied, Rented).

column.name: UPRN
column.description: Unique Property Reference Number; persistent identifier.

column.name: UPRN_SOURCE
column.description: Source of the UPRN matching.

table.name: epc_nondom_tbl
table.description: Energy Performance Certificate (EPC) data for non-domestic (commercial/industrial) properties.

column.name: LMK_KEY
column.description: Lodgement Key; unique identifier for the EPC certificate.

column.name: BUILDING_REFERENCE_NUMBER
column.description: Unique reference number for the building.

column.name: ASSET_RATING
column.description: CO2 emission index (0-150+); lower values indicate better performance (unlike domestic ratings).

column.name: ASSET_RATING_BAND
column.description: Energy efficiency band (A+ to G) based on asset rating.

column.name: PROPERTY_TYPE
column.description: Commercial property type (e.g., Office, Retail, Warehouse).

column.name: TRANSACTION_TYPE
column.description: Reason for the EPC (e.g., Mandatory issue on sale/lease).

column.name: NEW_BUILD_BENCHMARK
column.description: Benchmark rating for a new building of this type.

column.name: EXISTING_STOCK_BENCHMARK
column.description: Benchmark rating for existing building stock of this type.

column.name: BUILDING_LEVEL
column.description: Complexity level of the building assessment (Level 3, 4, or 5).

column.name: MAIN_HEATING_FUEL
column.description: Primary fuel used for heating.

column.name: RENEWABLE_SOURCES
column.description: Description of on-site renewable energy sources.

column.name: FLOOR_AREA
column.description: Total useful floor area (m2).

column.name: STANDARD_EMISSIONS
column.description: Standard CO2 emissions for this building type.

column.name: TARGET_EMISSIONS
column.description: Target CO2 emissions rate.

column.name: TYPICAL_EMISSIONS
column.description: Typical CO2 emissions for this building type.

column.name: BUILDING_EMISSIONS
column.description: Actual calculated CO2 emissions rate for the building.

column.name: AIRCON_PRESENT
column.description: Indicates presence of air conditioning.

column.name: AIRCON_KW_RATING
column.description: Rated output of the air conditioning system (kW).

column.name: AC_INSPECTION_COMMISSIONED
column.description: Flag indicating if an AC inspection has been commissioned.

column.name: BUILDING_ENVIRONMENT
column.description: Dominant ventilation/conditioning environment (e.g., Air Conditioning, Natural Ventilation).

column.name: PRIMARY_ENERGY_VALUE
column.description: Primary energy use per square meter.

column.name: UPRN
column.description: Unique Property Reference Number.

table.name: ghg_emissions_tbl
table.description: Official Greenhouse Gas (GHG) emissions statistics by territory and scope of influence.

column.name: la_ghg_sector
column.description: High-level sector for GHG reporting.

column.name: la_ghg_sub_sector
column.description: Detailed sub-sector for GHG reporting.

column.name: greenhouse_gas
column.description: Type of gas (usually CO2 or CO2e).

column.name: territorial_emissions_kt_co2e
column.description: Emissions generated within the territory boundaries (kilotonnes CO2e).

column.name: emissions_within_the_scope_of_influence_of_las_kt_co2
column.description: Emissions considered within the Local Authority's scope of influence (subset of territorial).

table.name: imd_lsoa_tbl
table.description: Indices of Multiple Deprivation (IMD) data aggregated at the LSOA level.

column.name: lsoa11cd
column.description: LSOA code (2011 Census).

column.name: income_deprivation_domain_rank
column.description: Rank of income deprivation (1 is most deprived).

column.name: index_of_multiple_deprivation_imd_decile
column.description: Overall IMD decile (1 is most deprived 10% of areas).

column.name: index_of_multiple_deprivation_imd_score
column.description: Overall IMD score calculated from domain scores.

table.name: la_all_mysoc_tbl
table.description: Registry of UK Local Authorities containing codes, names, and metadata, potentially sourced from MySociety/MapIt.

column.name: local-authority-code
column.description: Primary code for the Local Authority.

column.name: gss-code
column.description: Government Statistical Service (ONS) code.

column.name: pop-2020
column.description: Population estimate (2020).

table.name: lsoa_2011_lookup_tbl
table.description: Lookup table mapping 2011 Census LSOAs to higher geographies.

column.name: lsoa11cd
column.description: LSOA code (2011).

column.name: lsoa11nm
column.description: LSOA name (2011).

column.name: lad11cd
column.description: Local Authority District code (2011).

table.name: lsoa_2021_lookup_tbl
table.description: Lookup table mapping 2021 Census LSOAs to Wards and Local Authorities.

column.name: lsoa21cd
column.description: LSOA code (2021).

column.name: lsoa21nm
column.description: LSOA name (2021).

column.name: wd24cd
column.description: Ward code (2024).

column.name: lad24cd
column.description: Local Authority District code (2024).

table.name: lsoa_2021_pwc_tbl
table.description: Population Weighted Centroids (PWC) for 2021 LSOAs.

column.name: lsoa21cd
column.description: LSOA code (2021).

column.name: x
column.description: Easting coordinate.

column.name: y
column.description: Northing coordinate.

table.name: lsoa_poly_2011_tbl
table.description: Polygon geometry for Lower Super Output Areas (2011 Census).

column.name: LSOA11CD
column.description: LSOA code (2011).

column.name: geometry
column.description: Polygon geometry.

table.name: lsoa_poly_2021_tbl
table.description: Polygon geometry for Lower Super Output Areas (2021 Census).

column.name: LSOA21CD
column.description: LSOA code (2021).

column.name: geometry
column.description: Polygon geometry.

table.name: postcodes_tbl
table.description: Directory of UK postcodes including geolocation and administrative hierarchy codes.

column.name: pcd7
column.description: Postcode in 7-character format.

column.name: pcd8
column.description: Postcode in 8-character format.

column.name: pcds
column.description: Postcode with single space.

column.name: dointr
column.description: Date of introduction.

column.name: doterm
column.description: Date of termination (if applicable).

column.name: lad25cd
column.description: Local Authority District code (2025).

column.name: lsoa11cd
column.description: LSOA code (2011).

column.name: lsoa21cd
column.description: LSOA code (2021).

column.name: imd20ind
column.description: IMD 2020 Index score.

table.name: postcode_lookup_tbl
table.description: Simplified lookup table for linking postcodes to statistical geographies.

column.name: lsoa21cd
column.description: LSOA code (2021).

column.name: ladcd
column.description: Local Authority District code.

table.name: tenure_tbl
table.description: Housing tenure statistics (owned vs. rented) by LSOA.

column.name: lsoa21cd
column.description: LSOA code (2021).

column.name: total_all_households
column.description: Total number of households in the area.

column.name: owned
column.description: Count of households owned outright.

column.name: social_rented
column.description: Count of households in social housing.

column.name: private_rented
column.description: Count of privately rented households.

table.name: ca_la_ghg_emissions_sub_sector_ods_vw
table.description: View: Open Data Standard (ODS) formatted view of GHG emissions by sub-sector for the Combined Authority.

table.name: epc_domestic_lep_vw
table.description: View: Domestic EPC data filtered geographically for the West of England Local Enterprise Partnership (LEP) area.

table.name: epc_domestic_ods_vw
table.description: View: Simplified domestic EPC data optimized for Open Data Standard (ODS) export, including calculated fields like tenure and derived construction dates.

column.name: geo_point_2d
column.description: Combined Lat/Long point.

column.name: n_nominal_construction_date
column.description: Calculated numeric year of construction from the age band.

column.name: construction_epoch
column.description: Broad era of construction (e.g., 'Before 1900', '1930 to present').

table.name: epc_domestic_vw
table.description: View: Enriched domestic EPC data joined with Postcode, Tenure, and IMD (Deprivation) data.

column.name: NOMINAL_CONSTRUCTION_YEAR
column.description: Calculated mid-point year of the construction age band.

column.name: CONSTRUCTION_EPOCH
column.description: Categorical epoch of construction derived from the nominal year.

column.name: TENURE_CLEAN
column.description: Standardized tenure category (Owner occupied, Social rented, Private rented).

column.name: imd20ind
column.description: IMD 2020 Index rank.

table.name: epc_non_domestic_ods_vw
table.description: View: Non-domestic EPC data optimized for Open Data Standard (ODS) export, filtered for the West of England area.

column.name: asset_rating
column.description: Building CO2 emission index.

table.name: epc_non_domestic_vw
table.description: View: Enriched non-domestic EPC data joined with Local Authority and Postcode geography.

table.name: per_cap_emissions_ca_national_vw
table.description: View: Calculated per capita emissions for the Combined Authority area, aggregated by year.

column.name: per_cap
column.description: Emissions per capita (tonnes).

table.name: simple_geog_lookup_vw
table.description: View: Simplified geography lookup linking Postcodes to Wards, LSOAs, and Local Authorities within the West of England.
